titlestmt.subtitle:
An inventory of
his cartoons at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: [Summit record]

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Seven original editorial cartoons by the American editorial cartoonist.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p:
Don Moore (1918-1992) was an American cartoonist for the Waukegan (Illinois)
News Sun and also for WGN-TV in Chicago. His worked appeared in the
Best Editorial Cartoons of the Year series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p:
The
Don Moore Cartoons consist of seven original editorial cartoons. The cartoons are not dated but are from before 1967. Moore drew the cartoons on illustration board with ink and crayon. The cartoons have paper overlays and while not dated, on the back of several there a day of the week is listed.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: &scrc_name; has collections of over one hundred cartoonists. Please refer to &subjindex; for a complete listing.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

scopecontent.p:
Don't Fall Off: armed forces
Don't Lose Your Voice: voting
Footprints to Fingerprints: crime, guns
Guess Who!: (car driving through the desert with an unidentifable driver)
Modern Man: natural resources
What Tree: Lyndon B. Johnson, Vietnam War, Great Society, budget
Well, It's Good Exercise: Charles De Gaulle
